# heightInPixels

**Instance Property**

An integer value that describes the height of the graphics device in pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
var heightInPixels: Int { get set }
```

## Instance properties

- **widthInPixels**: An integer value that describes the width of the graphics device in pixels.
